author: potuz
content: I'm planning on opening the breakout call issue this week to discuss the PR changing to Francesco's simpler version of forkchoice. <@641548687813902336> when do we expect Teku interop?

author: stefanbratanov
content: My plan is to focus on it next week and give an update on the call. Haven't worked properly on it, just rebased last week the branch on top of devnet-5.
